channel.title: How do i join a server!
channel.description: LOL im new to all of this i have got the moparscape client and i downloaded someones files for a server.. how do i get onto his server lol please help asap =] lol

item.title: How do i join a server!
item.dc:creator: @wutsjava wutsjava
item.description:
@wutsjava wrote:

LOL im new too but you have to join it by pressing the button!!! it doesnt work if you dont press the button, but then sometimes it goes gay and doesnt work properly and now im having java error java not found??? ??? help please??

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join a server!

item.title: How do i join a server!
item.dc:creator: @ZA_H ZÃ©H
item.description:
@ZA_H wrote:

1)Well all depends are you trying to play the server with your friend.

2)or if you are running your friends server to play yourself.

1)[answer] he will either have Hamachi or No-Ip. so open your client either silab mopar or a custum.
then for the IP adress if its something like Scape.no-ip.org then type that for the ip
if he is using hamachi then have hamachi running and use his IP adress for that [ex: 5.00.000.00]

2)[answer] Open up the server files and double click Run.bat.
it will be local host to use the 0.0.0.0 for IP.
Use and user and pass and log in.

Simple as that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join a server!

item.title: How do i join a server!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

wow, so your saying you have never played on someone elses server??

anyway…

click into the server files and double click run and ur server is on…

go onto silab client or download a client and go onto the server with 0.0.0.0 and tada.

and then ur on ur server.

Read full topic
